website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding treadmill with features that will make your workout easier, all for a price that falls on the middle of the spectrum.
pros: One of NordicTrack's mid-level treadmills that offers user-friendly features and an extremely durable build
Has a comfortable running surface that's easy on the joints and a large 14-inch touchscreen for accessing motivational trainers
cons: Somewhat pricey, but has a lot to offer for the cost

customer_reviews.title: The machine itself is cool with some great features
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is cool with some great features. However, putting it together is a nightmare. I'm pretty savvy and understand directions well, but this thing has screw in places that can't be reached with a socket, which is what you need to tighten the bolts with no wrench, which one was not provided. The Kick stand doesn't go together well either. When you push the bolt through the top part and push out the holder casing, the bolt will no longer go in. So that feature is basically useless because we couldn't install it. For such an expensive machine from a high end manufacturer, these issues should not exist. Seriously, bolts behind a metal bar? Dumb
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Track C 700 Treadmill - Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill arrived after confusing delivery schedule and left damage to the walls as they brought into the house. Assembly techs were amazing, called ahead, arrived on time and assembled quickly. The Treadmill C700 however worked for three days and has no power day four. Called Nordic's customer service and they offered little customer service. Stuck only to a script offering only to order part 7-10 business days to receive and then the tech would need to schedule appt. Amazon has been amazing trying to offer support and run interference, however at the end of the day Nordic Track C 700 Treadmill sits. Business day #9 and no communication yet from Nordic Track, not off to a good start :(
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Barkley

customer_reviews.title: I love my Nordic Track so much
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nordic Track so much....I use it at least 5 times per week. It is one of the best investments we have made! It is very quiet, so there is no problem watching TV or talking on the phone as I walk on the treadmill! ❤️😍❤️😍
customer_reviews.author: littlereddoll

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: After missing initial scheduled Home Services Installation, treadmill was finally assembled only to find out it doesn’t work. It’s been two days and still waiting to hear what will be done about this. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment but dont fall into the "the machine is lock" till you register on ifit.com
customer_reviews.text: Excelent machine, two days in use and I have no complains, BUT, and I say it again BUT, dont fall in the trap of "you cant use it if you dont regiter with iFit" Pres the bluetooh button for 30 plus seconds and you are good to go. Only if you want to use their app then you must register, give them your credit card number, you will get a free month then you will be charged $15.00 per month to use the app.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the C700 along with the assembly package on 6/29/17. The Treadmill was up & working on July 15, 2017. We started having computer problems on 8/29/17 and have not used it since. We contacted NordicTrack at that time and to date have not heard from them other than to say they received our email and will contact us. I contacted Amazon today and since we are out of the 90 day Amazon warranty period they can only try to help us get in touch with Nordic Track warranty services. We chose this unit because it has a small footprint and we wanted a simple basic unit for walking. The size works, but at this time, that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great! Nordic Track could learn from them.
customer_reviews.text: Please look for alternate treadmills unless you are prepared to shell out money for a monthly membership to Nordic Tracks iFit program. We only wanted to use the manual mode but the instructions provided were insufficient and our treadmill would only operate with an active membership to iFit. We tried to get in touch with Nordic Track customer service and could not each anyone. We then had Amazon customer service attempt to reach Nordic Teach support and they also could not reach anyone. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: the1dunn

customer_reviews.title: It was bent. The main frame .. the treading part
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say? We could not put it together, the piece that the arms bolt to are bent. I tried to call NordicTrack , no one there (virus related I guess) but someone could work from home! Amazon is not responding, I called them next. I could return it, except this 300 pound item is not easy to maneuver around and the box was beaten up in transit and we had to cut the box to get it out. I am beyond witts end over this. I called the credit card company, since I spent 862.00 buck for this and can't reach anyone, I contested this charge... I will attach a picture..
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W

customer_reviews.title: Hold the bluetooth for 30 seconds to bypass activation.
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill seems to work fine if you can get past the activation phase after you turn it on. Ifit wants your cc info to register. The c700 instructions said to call if you dont have ifit device. After 30 minutes on hold, I googled and found that if you hold the bluetooth button for 20 seconds you can bypass it. This is not intuitive and i could see a lot of people getting "free" ifit and then getting billed to their cc once the free time lapses.
customer_reviews.author: fdl

customer_reviews.title: Eh... not thrilled..
customer_reviews.text: What a scam that you can’t turn on the treadmill without registering for iFit.. putting credit card info in annoys me.. i didnt want iFit, I just wanted to run to my music. Secondly, the Bluetooth only connects to iFit Bluetooth, so you can’t just use your phones Bluetooth to play music through the speakers... this treadmill seems to be set up for using iFit, so if you only plan on using iFit, just beware.. also, the belt seems low quality and even though there is shock absorption on the sides underneath the belt itself is very hard with no cushioning at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kthomps

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about NordicTrack C700 except the fan which I found a little anemic and poorly placed. The fan was a must for me, but a larger fan mounted below the control panel would have given a higher, whole body airflow. I added a simple window fan and am very happy with the homemade upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless without internet and a credit card.
customer_reviews.text: Awful, difficult to build, and you cannot use it until you register and give them a credit card. I just want to run and I’ve been on websites for days entering info. I like the iFit thing and it seems cool but it is not right that you can turn the thing on until you enter a credit card and Bluetooth it to a device. This is not a standalone unit and must be connected to the grid. BS, I’d return it if I could. Also, you cannot use a Kindle with these, only IOS or droid. I also cant find the preprogramed workouts??
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pro

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Incline function broke in the first week. Contacted support. It’s been two weeks and no answer. Call their customer support and they’re closed to “better train our staff”. I recommend buying a pro-form instead. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill have every feature you could want and is very well built. The fold factor is pretty cool along with the design. I would recommend this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Capable treadmill
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is a very capable treadmill for folks like me (e.g., not super athletic, but exercises fairly regularly). It has nice features. I've yet to use the Bluetooth as I don't have any devices to take advantage of it (i.e., heart monitors, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howell

customer_reviews.title: Try everything before the installer leaves.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy the extended service contract. A minimum of $250 will be charged. Also, look at the warranty carefully. The machine works great, except for the pulse rate bar. Never did work. They sent me parts to fix it myself, they were the wrong parts. Told me just to throw them out. After a year of trying to get the problem fixed, they told me it wasn’t covered because my treadmill is set up in my garage. So read the warranty carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase. I am not going through the trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Received an item that has a crack in the head board and the incline on this item does not work. Bad purchase. I am not going through the trouble shipping it back but would like someone to figure this out and get some compensation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My wife loves it (it was a gift). No problems encountered so far. The ifit app membership was too expensive though. She wanted to try it but can't afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Rastroboy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Nordic track C700
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this treadmill!! The delivery was on time the delivery guys brang it intp my appointment .. the next day a technician came to assemble it he was very polite & assembled it in about 45 minutes he also showed me how to work the treadmill.. I gotta say I'm glad i purchased this treadmill in spite of some of the bad reviews
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Good for people, not cats
customer_reviews.text: Decent treadmill for a 1st timer. The display and options could be better if more customizable. Cats are NOT a fan of this product. Watched some videos on YouTube to help our cat lose some weight and turns out, they don't actually want to walk on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake kitten

customer_reviews.title: Features are great, quality is not.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this treadmill for just over a year, but already the tablet holder broke and the incline motor burned out. Considering I kept the treadmill at the same incline constantly, I'm extra disappointed in the quality of the motor. It was barely used and clearly defective. My previous treadmill was less than half the cost and lasted over 10 years. I'm very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erikka Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Walk with me! Jog with me! Even run with me! What a superb device!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice treadmill. Easy to use. Controls are easy to access and work quickly. Readout panel is easy to understand and helps in formulating workouts. I use it regularly and am very pleased with my purchase. I got the professional installation and was really glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Art OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a month and its perfect. I've been able to use it daily without any problems. I set up my ipad on the stand and do my walking/running. Sound quality for the speakers are not that great, but headphones are nice. Anyways, it was just what I was looking for. No problems! Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Natisha Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 30 days now. Works great, very quiet, runs smooth, nice features. I thought it had bluetooth speakers but you have to plug in via ac jack. Not a big deal, but "bluetooth" is advertised all over the graphics. Turns out the bluetooth is only for the paid app. #lame I recommend it as a great treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Teadmill
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product, Quiet and Efficient. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November. Worked good for a couple months. It shuts off after about 20 minutes of use. I called the company. They want me to remove 8 screws and do this and that and take a video. Really they will not send anyone out. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Canney

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this treadmill a year ago and before the year was up the mother board went bad so they sent me another one for me to install the a a couple of months later the incline stays in the incline position. So I called the customer service and they said they could not do anything about it.Stay away from this product because they do not take care of there customers and I will not buy another product from them again
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck Trying to Get In Touch with Support
customer_reviews.text: Spend your money else where. Technical support is impossible to get help. I have tried both phone and chat and you will wait hours for a human.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: I don't need the bells and whistles; I just want to walk and run! The speed buttons along the right side are great for people that are doing a training program that requires walking/jogging intervals.
customer_reviews.author: madewade

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoor workouts
customer_reviews.text: Living in a region where it’s summer 12 Months a year makes this a great means to insure I get 10k steps daily.
customer_reviews.author: ACOY

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Just beware they want you to pay 40 bucks a month for ifit membership. You can join a gym for that price and use 30 to 40 different pieces of equipment..
customer_reviews.author: Brian B. Weidenhammer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was actually fairly easy to assemble. The instructions were very clear and all hardware is actually labeled by each step (Step 1, Step 2, etc.). Thus far I am pleased with the purchase and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy James

customer_reviews.title: Dssappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just got the nordic track this past 5th of December. It is already having problems and it will not recline. I have been all morning trying to get someone on the phone to assist me without luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill electronically "locked" out
customer_reviews.text: Unable to turn treadmill on, it requires a online "rogue company" monthly fee . This is ridiculous, I purchased this without any pre-conditions. Please advise. Product is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Green

customer_reviews.title: Not very user friendly ......well made and so far vey reliable
customer_reviews.text: Well built reliable ...not an intuitive machine read entire Manuel thoroughly before use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraud warranty
customer_reviews.text: We liked the treadmill till it broke down exactly 6 months later with not so frequent use. ! What is worse is that Nordic tracks warranty is a fraud. They do not respond. We filled out their form online many times but have never heard back ! What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Not good for walking and holding the handles at the same time
customer_reviews.text: The motor cover projects too far over the treadmill itself and if you are walking and holding on to the handles it is too easy to trip over it. We had to return it to Amazon which has been an ordeal unto itself unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Steven I. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill purchase
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great product. Installation was an option that I chose to take advantage of...not sorry. It does exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: genevievesl

customer_reviews.title: A good treadmill for the price
customer_reviews.text: A good treadmill for the price. The only thing I don't like is that the pulse monitor doesn't appear to always be adequate..
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: DISPLAY IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: HUSBAND ASSEMBLED IT IN NO TIME AND THE DISPLAY IS GREAT AND IT EVEN HAS A FAN!!!
customer_reviews.author: CaveWoman

customer_reviews.title: Keep’s the family healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely treadmill for indoor use and economical. I didn’t want all the ‘smart’ upgrades so this works great. This is a solid buy indeed. Not recommended for permanent outdoor use but works well in the garage. I purchased the setup as it’s worth the complicated assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Geek to Sheek

customer_reviews.title: 37 Calories burn today in the House
customer_reviews.text: I just setup mine today, I Love it, May first start running, Burn 500 calories in 37 minutes, Very very good Machine
customer_reviews.author: jpfelix

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Treadmill, so smooth, programs are awesome, I LOVE this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together and it did take awhile. We use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wallete

customer_reviews.title: It is the right treadmill for my use
customer_reviews.text: Factory support is almost non existent. It seems to be designed not to give the customer any support. Any additional warranty is a waste of money. I like the treadmill. I don't like the way they do business.
customer_reviews.author: barney h.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this treadmill, it was easy to assemble, and it runs like a dream. I love the incline option and all the other features it has. Super satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Zackery

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: arrived fine and assembled fine, usage was great for 2 years and now the motor controller is out. would think the product would last longer than 2 years. disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rebecca Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nordic Track C 700 Treadmill was received in damage condition. I would like return it because i cannot use it .
customer_reviews.author: Maninder Grewal

customer_reviews.title: it is missing parts
customer_reviews.text: i have attempted to make contact with Norditrac and have not received a call back.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Canela

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: purchased treadmill a year and a half belt ripped..... had problems from the beginning...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find a few pieces missing for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dean the smithy.

customer_reviews.title: Good walking machine
customer_reviews.text: Won't say I really enjoy it. But, it is a necessary evil during the winter months. Would be a little under-powered for running. I just use for daily walks.
customer_reviews.author: bill*facebook

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love ur new treadmill. Very easy to assemble and love the features!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great treadmill for the non-marathon runner. The location of the console feels awkward though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. It was worth the splurge
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this machine about 2 months. I absolutely love it. It was worth the splurge, but thankful to have purchased it while on sale. This suits my current need of needing somewhere to walk/jog/run without having to leave the house. It saves me time and money. The built in fan is nice. It’s big, but does fold up if needed. I think it took my husband about an hour and a half to put together. He only need my help once, to help install the board.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Roney

customer_reviews.title: Credit card required... to use it.... yeah
customer_reviews.text: Pro- Treadmill is fine for the money ( don't know though just got it today and can't use it due to the con ) Cons- They make you sign up for a membership witch is payed just to activate the treadmill. Yup the treadmill will not work until you have given them a credit card number.... no really.... before you can ever use it in the hopes you forget to cancel just so they can charge you $144 after your 1 month free trial is up. this is absurd! i do not recommend doing business with a company that would do something so scummy. 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Beerybros

product_meta.title: Nordic Track C 700 Treadmill
product_meta.description:
Walk, jog, or sprint-this treadmill accommodates speeds up to 10 mph. With OneTouch controls, you can change your settings with one button press instead of scrolling through options. View all your important stats on a multi-window LED display that shows your heart rate, and distance. See how many calories you burn with an integrated calorie burn meter. With the integrated tablet holder you can enjoy your favorite shows, music, and movies while you work out. The built-in sound system projects high-quality sound through dual 2-inch speakers. 

*Continuous Horsepower ("CHP") is a term used in the treadmill industry for consumer comparison purposes. The CHP rating is measured in laboratory testing using a dynamometer, which measures the mechanical power of the motor. The CHP rating does not denote the operational horsepower of the treadmill in ordinary household use. In ordinary household use, the motor does not operate at the horsepower shown.
feature_bullets: Interactive personal training at home powered by iFit; gain access to on demand, interactive trainer led global and studio workout programs; membership required, sold separately
10% OneTouch incline control, 10 MPH smart one touch speed control; Spacious 20” x 55” tread belt

Bluetooth connection allows iFit to automatically adjust your treadmill’s speed and incline to match trainer recommendations and mimic real life terrain; Integrated tablet holder secures your tablet or smartphone
Enjoy reduced motor noise and self cooling technology with a powerful 2.75 CHP Motor perfect for running, jogging, and walking in the comfort of your home
Innovative SpaceSaver design with easylift assist means your treadmill can fold up after your run for compact, simple storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
